um we run everything out of AWS we're in

microservices um by decoupling the

independently we achieve a continuous

Contin continuous integration and

Adder for monitoring and for history and

Bridging the Gap between the desktop and

critical for running the lightweight

Advanced scheduling needs we wanted to
be able to deal with the kinds of

talking
about but we really don't want or need
